inputs.name: network_name
inputs.description: The name of the network to be created

inputs.name: project_id
inputs.description: Project in which the HPC deployment will be created

inputs.name: region
inputs.description: The region where Cloud NAT and Cloud Router will be configured

inputs.name: subnetwork_name
inputs.description: The name of the subnetwork to returned, will use network name if null.

outputs.name: network_name
outputs.description: The name of the network created

outputs.name: network_self_link
outputs.description: The URI of the VPC being created

outputs.name: subnetwork
outputs.description: The subnetwork in the specified primary region

outputs.name: subnetwork_address
outputs.description: The subnetwork address in the specified primary region

outputs.name: subnetwork_name
outputs.description: The name of the subnetwork in the specified primary region

outputs.name: subnetwork_self_link
outputs.description: The subnetwork self-link in the specified primary region
